definition: (of a body of people) to offer all kinds of different opinions (idiom)/to argue endlessly

sentences.english: This aspect of Luke's work has occasioned much discussion.
sentences.chinese: 這方面的盧克工作的情況，議論紛紜。

sentences.english: Scholars vary their opinions on the connections between Confucius and Mao Zedong.
sentences.chinese: 他們之間有何關聯，論者衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: It is showing no difference for basic concept of school mental - health education.
sentences.chinese: 中小學心理健康教育的基本概念衆說紛紜，莫衷一是。

sentences.english: Opinions vary on the family life of the scientist.
sentences.chinese: 有關這位科學家的家庭生活，衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: The historicalization of myths is a subject which has been debated for long.
sentences.chinese: 神話歷史化是神話學聚訟紛紜的一個久遠課題。

sentences.english: Throughout Shu-shan Wen-hai, with regard to the interpretation of love can be described are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 縱觀書山文海，關於愛情的詮釋可謂是衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Have wide divided opinio regarding the oil price rises primary cause and the countermeasure people.
sentences.chinese: 對於油價上漲的主要原因和對策人們衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: This fire was no doubt caused by arson.
sentences.chinese: 關於起火原因及縱火者，至今衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: It is a debatable issue in academic circles whether the Han nationality had epic in its early stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 學術界在漢民族有無史詩的問題上一直聚訟紛紜。

sentences.english: After the fall of Small Swords Society Uprising, opinions vary on the whereabouts of Liu Lichuan.
sentences.chinese: 小刀會起義失敗後，劉麗川的下落歷來衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Opinions vary about the origin and historical development of Tanci.
sentences.chinese: 關於彈詞的淵源流變，歷來衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Opinions about Wedding ceremony at dusk has been widely explained since Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自漢以來，親迎之禮何以“昏以爲期”衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Opinions vary on why this happened.
sentences.chinese: 中國的政策爲何會發生這樣的轉變，一直衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Up till now opinions are divided as to the cause of the fire and who was the arsonist.
sentences.chinese: 關於起火原因及縱火者，至今衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: As with foxhunting in Britain, views seem irreconcilable.
sentences.chinese: 正如獵狐之在英國，意見紛紜，且不可調和。

sentences.english: And people from Ho's, opinion, is estimated by the ancient Turkic .
sentences.chinese: 而人出自何年代，衆說紛紜，估計是古代突厥所爲。
